Item.sqlserver_body:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.tables WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[innovator].[PROJECT_TASK]')) IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM [PROJECT_TASK]) RAISERROR ('Cannot drop [PROJECT_TASK] since records exist there', 16, 1) ELSE DROP TABLE [PROJECT_TASK]
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.views WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[innovator].[PROJECT_TASK]')) DROP VIEW [PROJECT_TASK]
Item.name: Project_Task_Step01_Drop
